revised_title: The Thermal Decomposition of Ammonium Perchlorate: Kinetics, Particle Size Effects, and Discussion of Results
tldr: This article investigates the thermal decomposition of ammonium perchlorate, focusing on the kinetics of the process and the effect of particle size. The authors discuss their findings and provide insights into the behavior of ammonium perchlorate under various conditions. Their research contributes to the understanding of the properties and potential applications of this compound.
